range.description: The phone number range included in the block.

phone_numbers_count.description: The count of phone numbers in the number order.

connection_id.description: Identifies the connection associated with this phone number.

messaging_profile_id.description: Identifies the messaging profile associated with the phone number.

customer_reference.description: A customer reference string for customer look ups.

created_at.description: An ISO 8901 datetime string denoting when the number order was created.

updated_at.description: An ISO 8901 datetime string for when the number order was updated.

requirements_met.description: True if all requirements are met for every phone number, false otherwise.

errors.description: Errors the reservation could happen upon
